vulnerabilities.title: Missing Security Header - HTTP Strict Transport Security (HSTS)
vulnerabilities.description: Forces browsers to use HTTPS connections only

vulnerabilities.title: Missing Security Header - Content Security Policy (CSP)
vulnerabilities.description: Prevents XSS, clickjacking, and code injection attacks

vulnerabilities.title: Missing Security Header - X-Frame-Options
vulnerabilities.description: Prevents clickjacking attacks by controlling iframe embedding

vulnerabilities.title: Missing Security Header - X-XSS-Protection (Legacy)
vulnerabilities.description: Enables browser XSS filters (deprecated, use CSP instead)

vulnerabilities.title: Missing Security Header - Referrer-Policy
vulnerabilities.description: Controls how much referrer information is shared

vulnerabilities.title: Missing Security Header - Permissions Policy (formerly Feature-Policy)
vulnerabilities.description: Controls which browser features can be used

vulnerabilities.title: Missing Security Header - X-Permitted-Cross-Domain-Policies
vulnerabilities.description: Controls cross-domain policies for Adobe Flash and PDF

vulnerabilities.title: Missing Security Header - Cross-Origin-Embedder-Policy (COEP)
vulnerabilities.description: Prevents loading cross-origin resources without explicit permission

vulnerabilities.title: Missing Security Header - Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy (COOP)
vulnerabilities.description: Isolates browsing context from cross-origin windows

vulnerabilities.title: Missing Security Header - Cross-Origin-Resource-Policy (CORP)
vulnerabilities.description: Prevents other domains from reading responses
